channel.title: M.C. Adamescu | Global freshwater biodiversity research

item.title: A global agenda for advancing freshwater biodiversity research
Safeguarding freshwater life beyond 2020: Recommendations for the new global biodiversity framework from the European experience
item.description: +++ title = “Safeguarding freshwater life beyond 2020: Recommendations for the new global biodiversity framework from the European experience” date = “2021-02-01” authors = [“van Rees, C.B.”, “Waylen, K.” , “Schmidt-Kloiber, A.”, “Thackeray, S.” , “Kalinkat, G.”, “Martens, K.”, “Domisch, S.”, “Lillebø, A.I.”, “Hermoso, V.”, “Grossart, H.-P.”, “Schinegger, R.”, “Decleer, K.”, “Adriaens, T.”, “Denys, L.”, “Jarić, I.”, “Monaghan, M.T.”, “Janse, J.”, “De Wever, A.”, “Geijzendorffer, I.”, “Adamescu, M.”, “Jähnig, S.C”]
